modName: ENB Settings - Nights be cold and dark - 02
summary: I have installed the latest ENBseries v0.100 and have been tuning all the new settings in the enbseries.ini for some hours know. Is really fun to do. :) Let me share my settings with you.
descriptionHtml:
[i]NOTE: Sorry - the screenshots look brighter here then they are in game. [/i]
[i]Credits to: Boris Vorontsov (aka ENB) for his ENBseries shader! [/i]

[b]What will happen if you use theese settings?[/b]

The days might look quite similar to before. I gave the sun a little more power and reduced the global light a bit and reduced colors in the shadows so it looks a little more like in south italy now than in denmark.
 
But the nights - a totally different story. They are quite dark, but you don\'t feel lost in the darkness. You can see the guards - but you have to look for them really carefully. 

Because of the nordic setting of skyrim I\'ve decided to use light, bloom and fog a lot more. It now gives you the feeling that there is a place to get a nice and comfortable shelter. 

You will not see this forsaken auto-brightness-adjust-thing in effect! What does that mean?
- Sneaking is far more fun again. 
- Fast moving dragons are scary at night. 

Now you can definitely decide if it is day or night without looking on the watch. ;)

---
[b]Installing[/b]

First get the ENBseries v0.100 here:
http://enbdev.com/download_en.htm
http://enbdev.com/enbseries_skyrim_v0100.zip

Just extract the ZIP file into c:\\Programms\\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim 
so enbseries.ini lies next to TESV.exe

Check if it is working in skyrim! If not: Not my problem. ;) But I am sure someone made a NMM-Package with a v0.100 installer.

If it is working:

Replace the content of enbseries.ini with theese settings:

[code]
[PROXY]
EnableProxyLibrary=false
InitProxyFunctions=true
ProxyLibrary=other_d3d9.dll

[GLOBAL]
AdditionalConfigFile=userconfig.ini
UseEffect=true

[FIX]
ForceSingleCoreCPU=false
IgnoreThreadManagement=true
IgnoreThreadPriority=true
AntiBSOD=true

[MULTIHEAD]
ForceVideoAdapterIndex=false
VideoAdapterIndex=0

[LIMITER]
WaitBusyRenderer=false
EnableFPSLimit=false
FPSLimit=60.0

[INPUT]
//back
KeyReadConfig=8
//shift
KeyCombination=16
//f12
KeyUseEffect=123
//home
KeyFPSLimit=36
//num /
KeyShowFPS=106
//insert
KeyScreenshot=45

[ENGINE]
ForceAnisotropicFiltering=false
MaxAnisotropy=8
SkipShaderOptimization=false

[EFFECT]
UseOriginalPostProcessing=false
EnableBloom=true
EnableAdaptation=true
EnableAmbientOcclusion=true

[BLOOM]
Quality=1
Radius1=1.8
Radius2=2.8
AmountDay=0.5
AmountNight=1.5
BlueShiftAmountDay=1.0
BlueShiftAmountNight=1.0

[CAMERAFX]
LenzReflectionIntensityDay=1.0
LenzReflectionIntensityNight=1.0
LenzReflectionPowerDay=8.0
LenzReflectionPowerNight=1.0

[SSAO_SSIL]
UseIndirectLighting=true
SamplingQuality=1
SamplingRange=0.7
FadeFogRangeDay=7.0
FadeFogRangeNight=7.0
SizeScale=0.35
SourceTexturesScale=0.35
FilterQuality=1
AOAmount=2.0
ILAmount=2.5

[NIGHTDAY]
DetectorDefaultDay=false
DetectorLevelDay=0.65
DetectorLevelNight=0.12
DetectorLevelCurve=0.8

[ADAPTATION]
ForceMinMaxValues=false
AdaptationSensitivity=0.1
AdaptationTime=10.0
AdaptationMin=0.1
AdaptationMax=100.0

[ENVIRONMENT]
DirectLightingIntensityDay=11.0
DirectLightingIntensityNight=0.2
DirectLightingCurveDay=1.05
DirectLightingCurveNight=1.0
DirectLightingDesaturationDay=0.0
DirectLightingDesaturationNight=0.95

SpecularAmountMultiplierDay=1.00
SpecularAmountMultiplierNight=0.4
SpecularPowerMultiplierDay=1.00
SpecularPowerMultiplierNight=0.4
SpecularFromLightDay=1.0
SpecularFromLightNight=0.2

AmbientLightingIntensityDay=1.35
AmbientLightingIntensityNight=0.2
AmbientLightingCurveDay=1.0
AmbientLightingCurveNight=1.0
AmbientLightingDesaturationDay=0.3
AmbientLightingDesaturationNight=1.0

PointLightingIntensityDay=1.0
PointLightingIntensityNight=3.0
PointLightingCurveDay=1.2
PointLightingCurveNight=1.5
PointLightingDesaturationDay=0.0
PointLightingDesaturationNight=0.0

FogColorMultiplierDay=0.6
FogColorMultiplierNight=0.3
FogColorCurveDay=1.0
FogColorCurveNight=1.0

ColorPowDay=2.0
ColorPowNight=1.7

[SKY]
Enable=true

StarsIntensity=0.6
StarsCurve=1.0

AuroraBorealisIntensity=0.4
AuroraBorealisCurve=1.5

CloudsIntensityDay=1.0
CloudsIntensityNight=1.0
CloudsCurveDay=1.0
CloudsCurveNight=1.0
CloudsDesaturationDay=0.0
CloudsDesaturationNight=0.0

GradientIntensity=1.0
GradientDesaturation=0.2

GradientTopIntensityDay=2.5
GradientTopIntensityNight=0.3
GradientTopCurveDay=1.5
GradientTopCurveNight=1.0

GradientMiddleIntensityDay=4.0
GradientMiddleIntensityNight=0.5
GradientMiddleCurveDay=1.5
GradientMiddleCurveNight=1.0

GradientHorizonIntensityDay=7.0
GradientHorizonIntensityNight=0.8
GradientHorizonCurveDay=1.5
GradientHorizonCurveNight=1.0

SunIntensity=9.0
SunDesaturation=0.0
SunCoronaIntensity=15.0
SunCoronaCurve=1.0
SunCoronaDesaturation=0.0

MoonIntensity=0.5
MoonCurve=1.0
MoonDesaturation=0.0

[OBJECT]
SubSurfaceScatteringMultiplierDay=0.9
SubSurfaceScatteringMultiplierNight=0.5
SubSurfaceScatteringPowerDay=1.0
SubSurfaceScatteringPowerNight=0.4

[LIGHTSPRITE]
IntensityDay=1.0
IntensityNight=3.0
CurveDay=1.0
CurveNight=1.0

[WINDOWLIGHT]
Intensity=10.0
Curve=1.0

[VOLUMETRICFOG]
IntensityDay=1.0
IntensityNight=2.0
CurveDay=1.0
CurveNight=1.0

[FIRE]
IntensityDay=5.0
IntensityNight=20.0
CurveDay=2.0
CurveNight=1.0

[COLORCORRECTION]
UsePaletteTexture=true

[SHADOW]
ShadowObjectsFix=true

[/code]

You can change theese settings while skyrim is running. (you just have to switch into the skyrim-task two times so it recovers)

HAVE FUN! SHARE YOUR SETTINGS!

---
Off-Topic:

Telthalions Finer Hair (Telthalion) 
Less Talkative NPCs (Xylozi)
Colored Map Markers (Forsaken32)
Colorful Dragons 3 HD (Luddemann)
Deadly Spell Impacts (isoku)
